author: James Joyce
text: Dear Larbaud: Are you going out yet? If so, and if Mrs Nebbia is with you can you both dine with us on Saturday next at 8 p.m. here? We hope so. Donâ€™t make a mistake about the number. It is the same street but number eight and we are on the fifth floor left. There is a lift. Will you let me know in any case. Sincerely yours James Joyce
